The image was posted on Facebook on Marc: 2021, along with a Thai caption mentioning the restaurant and the reason for the crowd.
The image has been shared on multiple Fa: 3. A Google reverse image search revealed that the same image was published in an article by Thai economics magazine Sentangsedtee on March 28, 2020, discussing a promotional offer by the restaurant.
Another report by local newspaper Manage: 2020, also featured the same image and explained the viral clip of couriers in front of the restaurant.
